text: The Mazda CX-3 is a car made by Mazda, a Japanese car brand It is a small Japanese crossover SUV and is the smallest car made by the brand. It is made to fit into small areas, and designed for smaller cities and urban areas. ==Details== It started production in November 2014, and is code named ‘DK’. It is sleek and stylish, and is positioned below the larger Mazda CX-30. ==Facelift== In 2018, the CX-3 had gotten a small facelift with newer looking headlights and taillights. Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles CX-3
title: Mazda CX-3
